constituent: irrigate, water, water droplets, water pistol, sapling
heisigStory: Suffering from a drought, the farmers call on a witch who conjures up water to irrigate their crops.
koohiiStory1: You use water to irrigate your saplings.
koohiiStory2: A fairy needs a lot of water to irrigate those beating wings, so you have make sure they drink a lot to be well irrigated (see bewitched (#2078).
myStory: màu mỡ. vùng đất có nước trời
